desc: Ideal for prototyping or the foundation of a low to medium volume IoT product. The IoT Node reduces your development time and effort by including the core functionality and expansion capability to meet a wide range of IoT product needs.

layout.text: Jump start your IoT product or project with the Sentient Things IoT Node
From environmental monitors to industrial controllers, the IoT Node includes the foundational components and packaging needed to accelerate your internet of things product or project.
